Amsterdam:   Elsevier, pp. 369-422. Cajner, Tomaz, Tyler Radler, David Ratner, and Ivan Vidangos (2017).  “Racial Gaps in  Labor Market Outcomes in the Last Four Decades and over the Business Cycle,”  Finance and Economics Discussion Series 2017-071. Fisher, and Alejandro Justiniano  (2012).  “Macroeconomic Effects of Federal Reserve Forward Guidance,”  Brookings Papers on Economic Activity, Spring, pp. 1-80,  https://www.brookings.edu/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/2012a_Evans.pdf.
